Name: AP® Physics B Crash Course Book + Online (Advanced Placement (AP) Crash Course)

ReviewList.Text: For a crash course book, this book was extremely dense. There were tons of equations, very few good example problems and no tests. Although it is good, this should only be used for skimming review.

About to take the AP Physics B exam in May, I bought several different review books and watched hours and hours worth of physics videos. As I truly enjoyed the Crash Course for European History, I thought surely this book would live up to my expectations. Wrong! This book in an unorganized clutter of pictures and mishaps. The book failed to even mention torque at all and after spending 5 minutes attempting to read it, gave up and read a different review book. Personally for me, I enjoyed 5 Steps to a 5 for physics at least. But, if you want to see a bunch of formulas with no true explanation for some kind of review purpose, go ahead and spend the money.

Very useful, small and new as I expected. Shipping was fast, covers almost completely the whole course, could have just skipped school with this book. Only thing missing is solved examples in the book. Sometimes the conceptual and formulas aren't enough.
Most crash course books are average at best.  This one was impressive as it helped my child improve his letter grade in school.  I recommend this book!
This was a great deal. The book was great at a great price. I will recommend this book to everyone.
